title: "Researchers look to the human eye to boost computer vision efficiency"
excerpt: "WEST LAFAYETTE, Ind. — Conventional silicon architecture has taken computer vision a long way, but Purdue University researchers are developing an alternative path — taking a cue from nature — that they say is the foundation of an artificial retina."
